title: Backend Developer
description: Lead backend developer for Apertre Season 2 website, where we use GitHub API and other social media platform for data fetching and integration. This was used to calculate points for the Open Source Contribution tracking system.

title: Open Source Contributor
description: Enhanced MongoDB splitVector operation by implementing retry logic with exponential backoff, improved reliability of data chunking under transient failures, applying principles of fault tolerance, operating systems, and algorithmic optimization.
